channel.title: T2 Client Error! Help!
channel.description:
Error: T2 - 44,85,44 - 5,3152,3197 - 13,30,0,1,0,
Thats the error. In the second set of numbers "3152,3197" are the coordinates of the place where the monster drop is. I do not know the others. Basically, what is happening is that whenever I kill the unicorn in the lumbridge swamp, right when it drops the loot the client crashes. IDK what the heck is going on and I need a solution.
EDIT: found line of code
String s2 = "T2 - " + pktType + "," + anInt842 + "," + anInt843 + " - " + pktSize + "," + (baseX + myPlayer.smallX[0]) + "," + (baseY + myPlayer.smallY[0]) + " - ";

item.title: T2 Client Error! Help!
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Error: T2 - 44,85,44 - 5,3152,3197 - 13,30,0,1,0,

Thats the error. In the second set of numbers “3152,3197” are the coordinates of the place where the monster drop is. I do not know the others. Basically, what is happening is that whenever I kill the unicorn in the lumbridge swamp, right when it drops the loot the client crashes. IDK what the heck is going on and I need a solution.

EDIT: found line of code

		String s2 = "T2 - " + pktType + "," + anInt842 + "," + anInt843 + " - " + pktSize + "," + (baseX + myPlayer.smallX[0]) + "," + (baseY + myPlayer.smallY[0]) + " - ";
